content.text:
# Draft:Charles Edward Dews

Charles Dews and Charles E. Dews should link here
Charles Edward Dews was a state legislator in Georgia. He served in the Georgia House of Representatives and Georgia Senate.
See also
*List of former members of the Georgia State Senate
